alert.note: Alert for Lake; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:12AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lake and northwestern Cook Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wonder Lake to Prairie Grove to near South Elgin. Movement was east northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Glenview, Buffalo Grove, Wheeling, Northbrook, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Highland Park, Round Lake Beach, Wilmette and Vernon Hills. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 57 and 69. I-94 between mile markers 1 and 35. I-294 between mile markers 1 and 35. This includes... Oakton Community College, Chain O Lakes State Park, College of Lake County, Great Lakes Naval Training Center, Harper College, IL Beach State Park, Lake County IL Fairgrounds, Lake Forest College, Ravinia Music Festival, and Six Flags Great America. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
